original_text: Likewise, when all the men of Israel who had hidden themselves in the hill country of Ephraim heard that the Philistines were fleeing, they too followed hard after them in the battle.
korean_text: 에브라임 산지에 숨었던 이스라엘 모든 사람도 블레셋 사람들이 도망함을 듣고 싸우러 나와서 그들을 추격하였더라

sentences.original_text: when all the men of Israel
who had hidden themselves in the hill country of Ephraim
heard that the Philistines were fleeing,
they too followed hard after them in the battle.
